translated: The first section🔽The section on what is included

original: Methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevantassa āpattiyo sattannaṁ āpattikkhandhānaṁ katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā?
analyzed: methunam dhammam paṭisevantassa āpattiyaḥ sattannam āpatti khandhānam katihi āpatti khandhehi saṅgahitā
translated: When it comes to the offenses for having sexual intercourse, in how many of the seven classes of offenses are they found?

original: Methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevantassa āpattiyo sattannaṁ āpattikkhandhānaṁ tīhi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā—
analyzed: methunam dhammam paṭisevantassa āpattiyaḥ sattannam āpatti khandhānam tīhi āpatti khandhehi saṅgahitā

original: siyā pārājikāpattikkhandhena, siyā thullaccayāpattikkhandhena, siyā dukkaṭāpattikkhandhena …pe….
analyzed: siyā pārājika āpatti kkhandhena siyā thullaccaya āpatti kkhandhena siyā dukkaṭa āpatti kkhandhena pe
translated: in the class of offenses entailing expulsion; in the class of serious offenses; and in the class of offenses of wrong conduct. …

original: Anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karontassa āpatti sattannaṁ āpattikkhandhānaṁ katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā?
analyzed: anādariyam paṭicca udake uccāram vā passāvam vā kheḷam vā karontassa āpatti sattannam āpatti khandhānam katihi āpatti khandhehi saṅgahitā
translated: When it comes to the offense for, out of disrespect, defecating, urinating, or spitting in water, in how many of the seven classes of offenses is it found?

original: Anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karontassa āpatti sattannaṁ āpattikkhandhānaṁ ekena āpattikkhandhena saṅgahitā—
analyzed: anādariyam paṭicca udake uccāram vā passāvam vā kheḷam vā karontassa āpatti sattannam āpatti khandhānam ekena āpatti khandhena saṅgahitā

translated: in the class of offenses of wrong conduct.
The fourth section on what is included is finished.
